entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
